package.name: Zota_BetterContactForm
package.summary: The professional contact form help your customers comfortable to send message quickly whenever they want.
package.description:
The professional contact form help your customers comfortable to send message quickly whenever they want. You can change the recipient email, field, form color quickly as you want. Create your form within a minute.
High Conversion Rate: Better Contact Form make sure your customers can contact you easily whenever they need. Tell them you are listening. Never be Spammed: You hate spam. You hate Captcha. Right? Our latest spam protection technology make sure you will never be spammed and your customer will never have to enter a Captcha. Nice Design: The nice responsive design allows your customers to send message quickly on any devices (smart phone, tablets...) User Friendly: Your Better Contact Form is designed for the most convenience of using with Ajax / HTML5 technology Explore more benefits at BetterContactForm.com
We hope this free contact form will help your customers comfortable to drop a message quickly whenever they want.
package.notes: The professional contact form help your customers comfortable to send message quickly whenever they want. You can change the recipient email, field, form color quickly as you want. Create your form within a minute.
